reuters.title: TEXACO FILES IN TEXAS COURT TO ENJOIN 10.3 BILLION DLR BOND, PENNZOIL ATTORNEY
reuters.body: Manufacturers Hanover Corp said its OFP Inc unit acquired a Dallas office building through foreclosure. The company said it foreclosed on the Allied Bank Tower, a 1.2 mln-square-feet office building at One Fountain Place, Dallas. Reuter 
